title: Love Letters from Fictional Men: Love Letters from Fictional Paramours, Book 1
description: Surrender to the seductive words of fiction's most irresistible men. From the smoldering gaze of The Phantom to the sharp wit of Sherlock Holmes and Mr. Darcy, let their fiery confessions ignite your senses~Consider this book a passport to a world of fictional men where you will be swept away by a whirlwind of romantic the centuries old vampire bewitched by your intoxicating blood, the enemy-turned-lover whose kisses are as electrifying as their snark, a dangerously charming villain whose favorite game is the one he's playing with you… and that’s just a few. A dastardly silver fox, professor, werewolf, bad boy, fey prince, demon, pirate, mafia king, eldritch horror, we've got every fictional man you can imagine – and a few you probably haven't even dreamed of yet – all waiting to steal your heart.Prepare to be utterly, exquisitely, and deliciously swooned – one letter at a time.
author: Anita Zara
